accrueInterest().details: Uses a fixed borrow rate of 10% per year. Updates total supply and borrow assets and last accrued timestamp.

borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Calculates shares, checks liquidity, and handles cross-chain or local transfers. Accrues interest before borrowing.

params._chainId: The chain id of the destination network.
params.amount: The amount of tokens to borrow.

createPosition().custom:emits: CreatePosition when a new Position is created.
createPosition().custom:throws: PositionAlreadyCreated if the caller already has a Position contract.
createPosition().details: Each user can have only one Position contract. The Position contract manages collateral and borrowed assets for the user.

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address,b.custom:throws: ZeroAmount if shares is 0.amountSharesInvalid if shares exceed user's borrow shares.
repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address,b.details: Swaps selected token to borrow token if needed via position contract. Accrues interest before repayment.

params._fromPosition: Whether to use tokens from the position contract (true) or from the user's wallet (false).
params._token: The address of the token to use for repayment.
params.shares: The number of borrow shares to repay.

supplyCollateral(uint256).details: Transfers collateral tokens from user to their Position contract. Accrues interest before deposit.

params.amount: The amount of collateral tokens to supply.

supplyLiquidity(uint256).details: Users receive shares proportional to their deposit. Shares represent ownership in the pool. Accrues interest before deposit.

params.amount: The amount of borrow tokens to supply as liquidity.

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.custom:throws: ZeroAmount if amountIn is 0.TokenNotAvailable if _tokenFrom is not available in position.
swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.details: Executes a token swap via the user's Position contract. Accrues interest before swap.

params._tokenFrom: The address of the token to swap from.
params._tokenTo: The address of the token to receive.

returns.amountOut: The amount of _tokenTo received from the swap.

withdrawCollateral(uint256).custom:throws: ZeroAmount if amount is 0.InsufficientCollateral if user has insufficient collateral balance.
withdrawCollateral(uint256).details: Transfers collateral tokens from Position contract back to user. Accrues interest before withdrawal.

params.amount: The amount of collateral tokens to withdraw.

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).custom:throws: ZeroAmount if _shares is 0.InsufficientShares if user does not have enough shares.InsufficientLiquidity if protocol lacks liquidity after withdrawal.
withdrawLiquidity(uint256).details: Calculates the corresponding asset amount based on the proportion of total shares. Accrues interest before withdrawal.

params._shares: The number of supply shares to redeem for underlying tokens.

accrueInterest().notice: Internal function to calculate and apply accrued interest to the protocol.

borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Borrow assets using supplied collateral and optionally send them to a different network.

createPosition().notice: Creates a new Position contract for the caller if one does not already exist.

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address,b.notice: Repay borrowed assets using a selected token from the user's position.

supplyCollateral(uint256).notice: Supply collateral tokens to the user's position in the lending pool.

supplyLiquidity(uint256).notice: Supply liquidity to the lending pool by depositing borrow tokens.

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.notice: Swap tokens within a user's position.

withdrawCollateral(uint256).notice: Withdraw supplied collateral from the user's position.

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).notice: Withdraw supplied liquidity by redeeming shares for underlying tokens.
